products.name: Auralis Platform
products.short_desc: Comprehensive AI platform for robotics intelligence and automation.

products.name: Auralis Robot
products.short_desc: Autonomous mobile robot for warehouse and logistics operations.

products.name: TIAGo
products.short_desc: Modular research robot combining perception, navigation, manipulation, and HRI.

products.name: TIAGo Pro
products.short_desc: Next-gen mobile manipulator with enhanced arms for agile manufacturing.

products.name: ARI
products.short_desc: Interactive social robot with advanced HRI and multi-language speech.

products.name: StockBot
products.short_desc: Autonomous RFID inventory-tracking AMR for stores and warehouses.

products.name: RB3-730
products.short_desc: 3 kg payload, 730 mm reach, ±0.05 mm repeatability.

products.name: RB3-1200
products.short_desc: 3 kg payload, 1200 mm reach with IP66 option.

products.name: RB5-850
products.short_desc: 5 kg payload, ~928 mm reach, ±0.05 mm repeatability; widely distributed.

products.name: RB10-1300
products.short_desc: 10 kg payload, 1300 mm reach—the longest in RB series.

products.name: RB-N Series (NSF)
products.short_desc: NSF-certified variants of RB series for F&B environments (steam/oil).

products.name: Vega
products.short_desc: Dual‑arm mobile robot with dexterous hands, foldable torso/arms (up to ~2.2m reach), omni base, >10h operation.

products.name: Reachy 2
products.short_desc: Fully open‑source humanoid for embodied AI with 7‑DoF arms (~3kg/arm), VR teleop, stereo vision; available on mobile base.

products.name: Reachy (2021)
products.short_desc: First‑gen open robotic torso/head platform with teleop and Python SDK.

products.name: BellaBot
products.short_desc: Iconic tray‑delivery robot with multi‑modal HRI, 3D obstacle avoidance, and modular chassis.

products.name: PuduBot 2
products.short_desc: Upgraded PuduBot with higher performance and adaptability for all‑scenario deliveries.

products.name: KettyBot / KettyBot Pro
products.short_desc: Reception/delivery robot with built‑in advertising display and navigation for guiding customers.

products.name: SwiftBot
products.short_desc: Secure delivery with advanced maneuverability for crowded environments.

products.name: HolaBot
products.short_desc: Autonomous dish‑busser / collection robot used in hospitality/healthcare.

products.name: PUDU CC1 / CC1 Pro
products.short_desc: Four‑in‑one cleaning (sweep/scrub/vacuum/mop), with Pro variant using AI for enhanced autonomy.

products.name: Stretch 3
products.short_desc: Fully‑integrated mobile manipulator with dexterous wrist, gripper camera, dual head cameras; 24.5 kg.

products.name: Stretch 2 (legacy)
products.short_desc: Earlier model widely used in research; upgrade kit available to near‑Stretch‑3 capability.

products.name: myCobot 280
products.short_desc: World’s smallest 6‑axis cobot (sub‑1 kg), up to 250 g payload; variants: M5, Pi, Arduino, Jetson Nano.

products.name: myAGV (2023)
products.short_desc: 2D/3D navigation AMR that pairs with myCobot/mechArm/myPalletizer for composite robots.

products.name: mechArm / myPalletizer series
products.short_desc: Affordable 6‑DoF arms and palletizing variants for labs and classrooms.

product_capabilities.details: Indoor navigation & mapping for research scenarios.
Enhanced arm accuracy and compliance; teach by guiding.
Autonomous RFID stock counting and localization.

signals.headline: Auralis Platform 2.0 Released with Enhanced AI Capabilities
signals.summary: Major update includes improved computer vision models and real-time analytics dashboard.

signals.headline: Partnership with Major Manufacturing Company Announced
signals.summary: Strategic partnership to deploy Auralis robots in 50+ manufacturing facilities.

signals.headline: PAL Robotics showcases embodied AI at automatica 2025
signals.summary: Exhibited embodied AI; demos across platforms.

signals.headline: StockBot demos RFID at NRF 2025
signals.summary: RFID automation in retail; booth presence Jan 12–14.

signals.headline: TIAGo robot enables breakthrough in human-robot collaboration research
signals.summary: University study demonstrates improved task completion rates with TIAGo in collaborative scenarios.

signals.headline: ARI social robot deployed in Barcelona retail stores
signals.summary: Pilot program shows 40% increase in customer engagement and satisfaction scores.

signals.headline: PAL Robotics secures €15M Series B funding for international expansion
signals.summary: Funding will support R&D initiatives and expansion into Asian markets.

signals.headline: PAL Robotics hiring robotics engineers for TIAGo Pro development
signals.summary: Multiple positions open for mobile manipulation and HRI specialists.

signals.headline: StockBot partners with major retail chain for inventory automation
signals.summary: Multi-year agreement to deploy RFID robots across 50+ store locations.

signals.headline: TIAGo robot goes viral on social media for dance performance
signals.summary: Video of TIAGo performing synchronized dance routine reaches 2M+ views.

signals.headline: ARI robot demonstrates improved language learning in children
signals.summary: Study shows 25% faster vocabulary acquisition when children interact with ARI.

signals.headline: Manufacturing company seeks TIAGo Pro integration specialists
signals.summary: Contract position for implementing mobile manipulation in automotive assembly line.

signals.headline: StockBot wins Best Innovation Award at Retail Technology Summit
signals.summary: Recognized for breakthrough in autonomous inventory management solutions.

signals.headline: TIAGo software stack updated with enhanced navigation algorithms
signals.summary: New SLAM improvements provide 30% better accuracy in dynamic environments.

signals.headline: ARI robot assists in elderly care facility pilot program
signals.summary: Pilot shows reduced loneliness and improved medication adherence among residents.

signals.headline: User reports navigation issues with TIAGo in crowded environments
signals.summary: Customer feedback highlights challenges with obstacle avoidance in busy spaces.

signals.headline: Technical analysis of RFID accuracy improvements in StockBot
signals.summary: Research paper details 15% improvement in tag detection rates through algorithm optimization.

signals.headline: ARI robot competes in international HRI challenge
signals.summary: PAL Robotics team places 3rd in human-robot interaction competition.

signals.headline: TIAGo Pro deployed in precision manufacturing facility
signals.summary: Automotive supplier reports 20% reduction in assembly time with TIAGo Pro integration.

signals.headline: Analyst raises concerns about PAL Robotics market expansion timeline
signals.summary: Investment firm questions feasibility of rapid international growth strategy.

signals.headline: StockBot demonstrates 99.2% inventory accuracy in warehouse study
signals.summary: Academic research validates RFID robot performance in real-world logistics environment.

signals.headline: ARI robot enhances STEM education in Barcelona schools
signals.summary: Educational program shows increased student engagement in robotics and programming.

signals.summary: Samsung becomes largest shareholder (~$181M)

releases.notes: Enhanced AI models, improved analytics dashboard, and new API endpoints.
Improved navigation algorithms and extended battery life.
TIAGo Pro introduced with torque-controllable arms & HRI upgrades.
Web-based Animation & Visual Programming; updated Advanced Navigation.
Samsung’s additional 267B KRW stake to accelerate robotics expansion.
Investor blog highlights mission to advance dexterous manipulation.
Published dimensions, payload, and sensor suite.
AI‑powered upgrade to CC1 autonomous cleaning robot.
Two‑year effort to adapt Stretch for people living with ALS.
Announced bionic companion robot pets at CES 2025.
Launch announcements for 4NE1 Gen‑3 humanoid, MiPA, and open robotics ecosystem.
